import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./App.css';import{Form}from'@bpmn-io/form-js';import"@bpmn-io/form-js/dist/assets/form-js.css";import schema from"./schema.json";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const data={creditor:"John Doe Company",amount:456,invoiceNumber:"C-123",approved:true,approvedBy:"John Doe"};const form=new Form({container:document.querySelector('#app')});function App(){useEffect(()=>{// @ts-ignore
